assetsReceived._description: Update our store of assets data

loadAllAssets._description: Debugging only -- load assets for every account at once

loadAllPayments._description: Debugging only -- load payments for every account at once

loadPayments._description: Refresh our list of payments for a given account

paymentsReceived._description: Update our store of payments data

walletsReceived._description: Update our store of wallet data
